entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Showers beginning this evening and ending after midnight then 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming south 40 gusting to 60 early this evening then southwest 20 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
